faq.title: FAQ ‚Äî Sui Wheel
faq.metaDescription: Frequently asked questions about Sui Wheel - lucky wheel application on Sui blockchain with fair and transparent randomness.
faq.ogDescription: Frequently asked questions about Sui Wheel - lucky wheel application on Sui blockchain.
faq.heroDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about Sui Wheel

cta.title: Have more questions?
cta.description: If you can't find the answer to your question, please contact us for support.

overview.question: What is Sui Wheel and how does it work?
overview.answer: Sui Wheel is a lucky wheel application on the Sui blockchain using smart contracts to ensure 100% fairness. Organizers create wheels, add participants (up to 200 people), set prizes and fund the reward pool. Results are determined by on-chain randomness, transparent and tamper-proof.

overview.question: Why choose Sui Wheel?
overview.answer: Sui Wheel delivers 100% fairness with on-chain randomness, trustless security, fast speed with low fees, user-friendly interface and real-time tracking. Additionally, it supports advanced features like zkLogin, list import and flexible prize management.

blockchain.question: What do I need to know about the SUI blockchain?
blockchain.answer: Sui is a high-performance layer 1 blockchain designed for gaming and DeFi applications. Sui Wheel is built on Sui to ensure fast speed and low transaction fees. You need a Sui wallet (recommended Slush Wallet) to participate in on-chain wheels.

blockchain.question: Do I need to pay gas fees?
blockchain.answer: Yes, on-chain transactions will consume a small amount of SUI for gas fees. However, Sui has very low fees compared to other blockchains. You only pay fees when participating in actual on-chain wheels, not for off-chain demos.

blockchain.question: Is Sui Wheel safe?
blockchain.answer: Absolutely safe! Sui Wheel uses audited smart contracts and does not store user assets. All transactions are transparent and verifiable on the blockchain. Users always control their wallets and assets.

features.question: How to create a wheel?
features.answer:
1. Connect your Sui wallet
  2. Add participant list (up to 200 people)
  3. Set prizes and time
  4. Fund the pool with sufficient tokens
  5. Publish the wheel for everyone to participate

features.question: How can I add participants?
features.answer:
• Manually enter Sui wallet addresses
  • Import using online QR feature
  • Use X (Twitter) post import feature to automatically extract addresses from comments

features.question: What types of prizes are supported?
features.answer: Sui Wheel supports SUI tokens and other cryptocurrencies (coming next). You can customize the quantity and distribution of prizes flexibly according to your needs.

features.question: What is the difference between Off-chain and On-chain?
features.answer: Off-chain mode is for quick demos and testing without fees. On-chain mode is for real wheels with actual prizes, everything is transparent and permanently recorded on the blockchain.

features.question: Does the Shuffle button work?
features.answer: Yes! The Shuffle button actually works and can be verified on-chain. When you press Shuffle, the system generates a new random order for the participant list, and this process is recorded on the blockchain to ensure transparency and fairness.

frequentlyAsked.question: How to receive prizes?
frequentlyAsked.answer: If you win, a claim link will be generated each time the wheel ends. Access this link to claim your prize.

frequentlyAsked.question: Is there a time limit for claiming prizes?
frequentlyAsked.answer: Yes, organizers can set a deadline for claiming prizes. After this deadline, unclaimed prizes will be returned to the pool for redistribution or refunded to the organizer's wallet.

frequentlyAsked.question: Where can I track results?
frequentlyAsked.answer: All results are recorded on the blockchain and can be viewed directly on Sui Explorer. Additionally, Sui Wheel provides a real-time tracking interface so you can monitor wheels and winners.

frequentlyAsked.question: Does it support Google login?
frequentlyAsked.answer: Yes! Sui Wheel supports zkLogin with Google. This is the easiest way to get started with Sui Wheel. Remember that you need Sui coins in your wallet to create wheels.

frequentlyAsked.question: Can the wheel creator cancel the wheel?
frequentlyAsked.answer: Yes, the wheel creator can cancel the wheel provided you haven't executed the wheel yet. The reward pool will automatically refund to your wallet when cancelled.

frequentlyAsked.question: What happens if I don't claim prizes before the deadline?
frequentlyAsked.answer: You cannot claim prizes after the claiming deadline has passed.

frequentlyAsked.question: Can the creator recover the reward pool after the wheel ends?
frequentlyAsked.answer: Only when the prize claiming time has ended; if not yet due, cannot recover.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Sui Wheel?
whyChoose.description: Experience the future of fair gaming with blockchain-powered randomness and transparent results.

onChainRandomness.title: On-Chain Randomness
onChainRandomness.description: Every spin uses verifiable on-chain randomness, ensuring fair and transparent results that can't be manipulated.

secureTrustless.title: Secure & Trustless
secureTrustless.description: No central authority controls the outcomes. Smart contracts handle everything automatically and transparently.

fastEfficient.title: Fast & Efficient
fastEfficient.description: Built on Sui's high-performance blockchain for instant transactions and low fees.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Simple interface for organizers and participants. Connect wallet, configure, and spin!

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Monitor spins, winners, and claims in real-time with detailed analytics and history.

flexiblePrizes.title: Flexible Prizes
flexiblePrizes.description: Support for SUI tokens and other cryptocurrencies. Customizable prize amounts and distribution.

moreFeatures.title: More Features
moreFeatures.description: Powerful tools for organizers and participants

dualModeGaming.title: Dual Mode Gaming
dualModeGaming.description: Play both off-chain for quick demos and on-chain for real prizes with full transparency.

zkLoginGoogle.title: zkLogin Google
zkLoginGoogle.description: Sign in with Google account using zkLogin technology for seamless onboarding.

onlineImport.title: Online Import
onlineImport.description: Import participant lists online - perfect for workshops and offline events.

xPostImport.title: X Post Import
xPostImport.description: Paste X post link and automatically extract Sui addresses from comments.

verifiableShuffle.title: Verifiable Shuffle
verifiableShuffle.description: True on-chain shuffle with cryptographic proof that can be independently verified.

deadlineClaims.title: Deadline Claims
deadlineClaims.description: Set claim deadlines for prizes with automatic fund recovery after expiration.

cta.title: Ready to Spin?
